title: Bad credit Ok, Unfurnished apartments, No long term lease required
posting_body: ['Boulder II Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Jacuzzi available for tenants', '-Easy freeway access', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Rent by the week or month', '-No long term lease required', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Laundry facilities', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
